# Exercise 1

```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(mosaic)
urlfile = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jgscott/SDS323/master/data/ABIA.csv"
mydata <- read_csv(url(urlfile))
grouped_Data <- mydata %>% group_by(UniqueCarrier) %>% summarise(mean_delay=mean(DepDelay,na.rm=TRUE))

ggplot(grouped_Data,aes(x=UniqueCarrier,y=mean_delay)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity",fill="blue")


```
